text: Thermolongibacillus altinsuensis is a Gram-positive, aerobic, endospore- forming and motile bacterium from the genus of Thermolongibacillus which has been isolated from sediments from the Altinsu hot spring in Nevşehir, Turkey. ==References== Category:Bacillaceae Category:Bacteria described in 2014
title: Thermolongibacillus altinsuensis
